1621730.name: Obsidian Prince Soundtrack
1621730.description: Hi there! I’m Lautaro, the composer for Obsidian Prince. This game is still a work in progress, and so is the soundtrack. I will continue to update the soundtrack along the way, and of course you’ll get all the new content without additional costs. You might notice that the soundtrack and other content in the game changes from time to time. That’s because we’re still developing some stuff. I’ll make sure that the soundtrack is as up to date as possible and if you look closely it might even give you some clues to upcoming changes in the game!
